title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Bengio is senior director of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Research at Apple and an adjunct professor at École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne. He was a longtime scientist at Google, where he led a large group of researchers working in machine learning, including adversarial ...

title: r/MachineLearning on Reddit: [D] Samy Bengio resigns from Google
snippet: Apple has hired Samy Bengio, a former AI scientist who resigned in protest of Google's firing of two employees, to lead a new AI team under John Giannandrea.
